Those who are facing difficulties follow these steps-
1. Burn Iso file in a DVD or a Pendrive.

2. Restart your PC & boot with ur DVD or Pendrive.

3. Click on Install Nowand Install Windows 8. If you are performing a fresh install backup your files.

4. Just Turn off your net connection during Installation and Activation.

5. After Installation go to Permanent Activator Folder and Start "ACTIVATOR_KJ.120829.exe" as ADMIN, a cmd window will appear then Press Y, It will activate your windows and Restart your PC.

6.After Restart again go to Permanent Activator folder and start "FIX_P8.25.exe" as ADMIN.It will again restart your pc.

7. Now Enjoy your Windows 8 is Activated.


IMPORTANT NOTE
1. Dont use Avast Antivirus with this torrent of Windows 8. Firstly it detects Activator as Virus and Second it kills your activation,Pc settings dont open,Blue Screen of Death appears from time time. Just Use another antivirus like AVG.

2. Turn OFF automatic updates.

3. Windows Store works perfectly with this. Log in with ur Microsoft Account and Download any App from the store,you can also update apps,it works fine.

4. Just a recommendation download Jetpack Joyride and Cut The Rope From Store, both are Free and Addicting Games.
